title: Managing Payment Plans on BALL
subtitle: Take control of your payment schedule and manage your home ownership journey effectively.

steps.title: Select Your Payment Plan
steps.description: Choose a payment plan that suits your financial situation and preferences. Whether you prefer a timeline payment plan or milestone payment plan, BALL offers flexible options to accommodate your needs.

steps.title: Review Payment Schedule
steps.description: Review the payment schedule associated with your chosen plan. Understand when payments are due and the amount required for each installment or milestone.

steps.title: Make Payments
steps.description: Make payments according to your schedule and financial capacity. Whether you prefer to pay online through your BALL account or via direct deposit into the designated bank account, ensure timely payments to stay on track with your home ownership goals.

steps.title: Track Payment Progress
steps.description: Track your payment progress and milestones achieved along the way. Stay updated on your journey to homeownership and celebrate each milestone as you move closer to owning your dream home.

steps.title: Adjust Payment Plan (if needed)
steps.description: In case of changes in your financial situation or preferences, you may have the option to adjust your payment plan. Contact BALL's customer support team for assistance in modifying your plan to better suit your needs.

steps.title: Stay Informed
steps.description: Stay informed about any updates or changes to your payment plan. Monitor communication channels such as email, SMS, or notifications within your BALL account to ensure you're aware of important information regarding your payments and home ownership journey.
